articles.author: Khaleda Rahman
articles.title: Joe Biden 'Asleep' at Climate Summit Sparks Wave of Criticism and Sympathy - Newsweek
articles.description: "America is in crisis, and Joe Biden is asleep at the wheel," House Republicans tweeted after a video showing Biden with his eyes closed during a speech at COP26 went viral.
articles.content:
President Joe Biden was seen on camera appearing to fall asleep during a United Nations climate change summit, prompting both criticism and sympathy.
A video posted on Twitter by Zach Purser Brown, … [+2707 chars]

articles.title: U.S. woman who assisted Bali 'suitcase' murder to be deported after release - The Star Online
articles.description: JAKARTA (Reuters) -     An American woman who was recently released from prison after serving part of a 10-year sentence for her role in the murder of her mother will be deported and return home on Tuesday, an immigration official in Bali said.
articles.content: Heather Mack, an American woman jailed in 2015 with her boyfriend after being found guilty for playing a role in murdering her mother and stuffing the remains in a suitcase, is seen inside an immigra… [+1766 chars]
